question: What are causes and the negative effects of watching too much TV.
text: Nowadays, people from different countries are watching TV too much extent. I think this matter stems chiefly from their introverted disposition and age categories, but there are some issues.

The reason why people are watching TV more than they used to mainly depends on their temperament. For example, the idle person is prone to getting sleep and watching TV rather than engaging in other social and mental activities. Another reason appears to be the propensity of the old generation is watching TV more than that of the young one. For example, TV channels such as news, and films are watched by the elder people by holding a large number of remaining hours due to the fact that they have retirements which they can no longer move to job.

There are some problems that have adverse effects on  people's health as well as progress thereby allocating much  time behind the TV. One of those proves to be spending much time  watching TV has a diverse detrimental effect because of detrimental TV rays. For instance, the eyesight is diluted, even corrupted, in people who spend a great deal of time  watching TV. Another problem that may be applied to especially children who are obsessed with watching TV is that which draws them back from  socializing like hanging up with peers.

In conclusion, profuse consumption of time  watching TV is mainly applied to those who have lazy moods as well as the elder generation; nevertheless, this activity brings about  mental or physical illness and socializing matters to people.
